Related repos

  • Up-to-date documentation for AI agents
  • Curated list of MCP servers for connecting AI models to tools and data sources
  • Connects Blender to Claude AI using Model Context Protocol for direct AI-driven control and 3D modeling
  • lets AI tools manage WordPress sites with a plugin
